## Purpose
---
The purpose of a JK Flip Flop is to flip the response of an SR Flip Flop, acting essentially as a memory toggle.

## Circuit Diagram
---
```circuitjs
$ 1 0.000005 1.3241202019156522 49 5 50 5e-11
151 160 128 192 128 0 2 5 5
w 160 144 160 160 0
w 192 128 192 160 0
151 160 224 192 224 0 2 5 5
w 160 208 160 192 0
w 192 160 160 192 0
w 192 224 192 192 0
w 160 160 192 192 0
w 144 112 160 112 0
w 160 240 144 240 0
R 112 176 80 176 1 2 100 2.5 2.5 0 0.5
L 112 112 80 112 2 0 false 5 0
L 112 240 80 240 2 0 false 5 0
w 112 176 112 128 0
w 112 176 112 224 0
w 192 224 208 224 0
w 192 128 208 128 0
w 208 128 224 128 0
w 112 96 112 80 0
w 208 224 208 80 0
w 208 80 112 80 0
w 224 128 224 272 0
w 224 272 112 272 0
w 112 272 112 256 0
M 224 128 256 128 2 2.5
M 208 224 256 224 2 2.5
150 128 240 144 240 0 3 0 5
150 128 112 144 112 0 3 0 5
w 112 112 128 112 0
w 112 96 128 96 0
w 112 128 128 128 0
w 112 224 128 224 0
w 112 240 128 240 0
w 112 256 128 256 0

```
